title: Accessibility (com.apple.universalaccess)
description: The payload that configures the accessibility features of the device.

closeViewScrollWheelToggle.title: Enable Zoom via ScrollWheel
closeViewScrollWheelToggle.description: If 'true', enables "Use scroll gesture" in the Zoom options.

closeViewHotkeysEnabled.title: Enable Zoom via Keyboard
closeViewHotkeysEnabled.description: If 'true', enables "Use keyboard shortcuts" in the Zoom options.

closeViewNearPoint.title: Maximum Zoom
closeViewNearPoint.description: The maximum zoom level in the Zoom options.

closeViewFarPoint.title: Minimum Zoom
closeViewFarPoint.description: The minimum zoom level in the Zoom options.

closeViewShowPreview.title: Show preview rectangle when zoomed out
closeViewShowPreview.description: If 'true', enables "Show preview rectangle" in the Zoom options. Only available in macOS 10.15 and earlier.

closeViewSmoothImages.title: Smooth images
closeViewSmoothImages.description: If 'true', enables "Smooth images" in the Zoom options.

whiteOnBlack.title: Invert colors
whiteOnBlack.description: If 'true', enables Invert Colors in Display Accommodations.

grayscale.title: Use Grayscale
grayscale.description:
If 'true', enables "Use grayscale" in the Display options.

This option is deprecated in macOS 11.

contrast.title: Display Contrast
contrast.description: The contrast value in the Display options.

mouseDriverCursorSize.title: Cursor Size
mouseDriverCursorSize.description: The size of the mouse cursor in a decimal value between 1 and 4, where 1 is normal and 4 is the maximum

flashScreen.title: Flash screen on alert sound
flashScreen.description: If 'true', enables "Flash the screen" in the Audio options.

stereoAsMono.title: Play stereo audio as mono
stereoAsMono.description: If 'true', plays stereo audio as mono.

stickyKey.title: Enable Sticky Keys
stickyKey.description: If 'true', enables Sticky Keys in the Keyboard options.

stickyKeyShowWindow.title: Display pressed keys on screen
stickyKeyShowWindow.description: If 'true', enables "Display pressed keys on screen" for Sticky Keys.

stickyKeyBeepOnModifier.title: Beep when a modifier key is set
stickyKeyBeepOnModifier.description: If 'true', enables the beep when a modifier key is set for Sticky Keys.

slowKey.title: Enable Slow Keys
slowKey.description: If 'true', enables "Slow Keys" in the Keyboard options.

slowKeyBeepOn.title: Use click key sounds
slowKeyBeepOn.description: If 'true', enables "click key sounds" for Slow Keys.

slowKeyDelay.title: Acceptance delay
slowKeyDelay.description: The acceptance delay, in milliseconds, for Slow Keys.

mouseDriver.title: Enable Mouse Keys
mouseDriver.description: If 'true', enables Mouse Keys in the Mouse & Trackpad options.

mouseDriverInitialDelay.title: Initial delay
mouseDriverInitialDelay.description: The initial delay before moving the mouse cursor with Mouse Keys in a decimal value representing seconds

mouseDriverMaxSpeed.title: Maximum speed
mouseDriverMaxSpeed.description: The maximum speed for the cursor when using Mouse Keys.
